J Michael Howard-Johnston is a male former rower who competed for England.
Rowing career
A member of the London Rowing Club and Leander, he represented England and won a bronze medal in the coxed four and a second bronze medal in the eights, at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia.
